name: Cape's Escape Game 2nd room
storyline: The main character has finally save up enough money to move. He's relieved that he doesn't have to deal with any more of Cape's pranks. But he doesn't seem to mind how ridiculously cheap the rent is at the next place. Let's hope that nothing horrible happens….
summary: The main character get trapped again by Cape, who shows up at the new location. Help him escape by solving all the puzzles.
